summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept.; establishing one (1) Public Information Coordinator, one (1) Administrative Ass't. and five (5) Laborers in the Engineering Dept. for a period not to exceed six (6) months from the date of hire; making appropriations from the Engineering Dept. Operating and the Solid Waste Funds; and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1986 budget of the Seattle Engineering Department therefor.
